Description: For sale is my minty Tom Anderson Hollow body drop top. Obviously it is an absolutely beautiful guitar and the fit, finish, tone and playability is everything you would expect from an Anderson. The roasted chocolate maple neck on this guitar is one of the nicest I have played. The hollow body gives it a great resonance and at only 6.8 lbs it's really comfortable to play. This guitar is equipped with the Anderson add bridge, VA booster and coil splitting wiring, witch provides a variety of tones. Just an amazing guitar I purchased as a collection piece and it has been a case queen. comes with original HSC and case candy. This guitar was $5,200 new. I am a guitar collector and builder and unfortunately I need to unload some of my collection for personal reasons. See my rating and my other items for sale. Free U.S. shipping. International shipping will be added to final price. Reasonable offers will be considered. Stunning piece, Don't miss this one. details below: Summary Finish: Tiger Eye Burst Body Details: Hollow body Neck Material: Rosewood Fingerboard Material: Rosewood Neck Profile: C Profile Neck Thickness (IN): 1st fret: .82", 10th fret: .86" Neck Details: Rosewood neck with Rosewood fingerboard and Clay Dot Inlays. Frets are like new. Plays great with no buzzing or dead spots. Electronics: Original electronics. Pickup Measurements: 16.35k Bridge / 12.59k / 12.78k Neck Hardware: Hardware is all original. Trem arm is in the case Switching: 5-way, add bridge with splitter + VA booster Weight: 6 lbs 8 ounces Case Details: Original Hard Shell Cosmetic Condition: Near mint from a collectors stash Tech Notes: Superb playability, no fret wear, buzzing or dead spots.
Title: Tom Anderson Custom Hollow Drop Top Classic Electric Guitar Chocolate Maple Neck
Subtitle: Custom order, Barely played
